attributes.action: Introduce legislation to keep all shops closed on Boxing day
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is designed to ensure that all retail staff in the uk are afforded the same traditional 2 day christmas break that every other non emergency service employee currently enjoys, without detriment to their employers. we ask for legislation so that boxing day be put on the same current footing as christmas day and easter sunday.
